title: Pixel 3a not receiving updates after Build no - RP1A.200720.009
content:
I subscribed for R beta and have been receiving monthly updates till Sept 5, 2020. The last update was on sept 5 and it had the build no. RP1A.200720.009.
On sept 9th lot of other users received the official Android 11 update but my phone didn't. 
Please help. Tried all possible ways..
